tool_description: Calculates electrical, plumbing, and gas requirements for selected appliances, including voltage, amperage, water connections, and ventilation needs.

appliance_models.description: Array of appliance model names to analyze

ventilation_type.description: Existing ventilation: none, exhaust_fan, range_hood, external_vent

error_messages: Invalid electrical capacity: Capacity must be between 100-400 amps for residential kitchens
Insufficient water pressure: Minimum 20 PSI required for most appliances
Invalid ventilation type: Use none, exhaust_fan, range_hood, or external_vent
Appliance model not found: One or more appliance models not in database
Electrical overload detected: Total appliance requirements exceed available capacity
usage: Input appliance models and current utility specifications to calculate total utility requirements and identify any upgrades needed.
